Title: Relates to indoor air quality in ice skating rinks
Summary: Requires ice skating rinks maintain a certain indoor air quality and maintain a certificate of acceptable air quality where a resurfacing machine is used.
LawCode: Add Art 13 Title 14 §§1389-hh - 1389-kk, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to indoor air quality in ice skating rinks
